name: NewJerseyTransit
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. j. transit
des:
Official NJ Transit real time status, allowing customers to ask for train schedules, service advisories and planning trips. 
examples:
"When is the next train from Metropark to New York"
"When is the last train of the day from New York to Edison”
"How do I get to Summit from New York by 3 pm"
"Tell me trains to MetroPark from Trenton departing at five pm"
"How do I go to Summit from New York to reach by 6 pm"

For any issues or feedback, please contact alexa@njtransit.com
